title: nADi vandEn kandA
sahitya:
nADi vandEn kandA nAn undaniDam nAnilam idanil pENum nalam peravE


anupallavi

  tEDi vandunnaDiyil deNDaniTTuyyavE kUDumen iru karam kUppit-tozhudiDavE


caraNam    kOrinadellAm nI koDuppAi ena nambi vEru eNNamE inidArum ArAi manadil
Uri enaduLLam taDumArip-paDu kuzhiyil uzhanriDak-kavizhndu vizhundu avadiyurAmal
